title: Injustice: Gods Among Us Ultimate Edition
Injustice: Gods Among Us Ultimate Edition
notes: It runs out of the box, but with noticeable frame-drops on animations. Steam Controller and overlay issues through-out, after 10-20 minutes of play: it starts registering duped inputs, or just starts seeing the controller as a keyboard. Repluging fixes this issue, that comes back after a while

title: Injustice: Gods Among Us Ultimate Edition

Some textures missing, animation with frame drops. Game itself works great. Online play was not tested.

title: Injustice: Gods Among Us Ultimate Edition

notes: I had to add "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" - Game works with some frame rate issues during first matches.
